description: Once an old inn, this family-run restaurant now occupies two floors with the wine bar on the ground floor and the dining rooms above. Inspired by traditional cuisine the dishes here are reinterpreted in modern style with plenty of character. The excellent wine list makes this a good choice for wine aficionados.
